rooms.description: A spacious foyer with a North-facing entrance aligned with Vastu principles to welcome positive energy. The area includes a decorative fountain or art piece.

Large open-plan living space for socializing and gatherings, designed with ample seating, lighting fixtures, and natural ventilation. Placed in the South-West direction to promote balanced energy flow.
Fully equipped kitchen placed on the South-East corner as per Vastu norms for prosperity, with modern appliances and ample storage space. Integrated pantry area.
Adjacent to the living room and kitchen; spacious dining table setup, natural light from windows placed in the East, promoting calm energy.
Convenient utility space for storage, laundry, and cleaning supplies, ideally located near the kitchen or corridor for ease of access.

openings.description: A grand North-facing entrance door providing a sense of welcome and balance, in line with Vastu principles.
Multiple windows strategically placed to ensure cross ventilation and natural light. Windows on the East and West walls for optimal energy flow.
Interior doors connecting all rooms, ensuring smooth flow of movement with secure locks where required.

rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with an attached en-suite bathroom. Placed in the North-West direction to align with Vastu for tranquility and privacy.

Three additional bedrooms distributed along the perimeter, each with sufficient storage space and individual balconies to allow natural light and ventilation. Bedrooms are oriented in directions that promote positive energy.
Dedicated home office with soundproofing, ergonomic furniture placement, and ample storage. Positioned in the North-East corner to encourage productivity while balancing energy.
A dual-purpose space serving as a quiet library for reading and studying. Designed with shelving units, cozy seating, and natural light from an East-facing window to stimulate concentration.

Entertainment room featuring state-of-the-art audiovisual equipment, comfortable seating for family gatherings, and sound insulation. Ideally located in the South-West direction to support recreational energy.
A guest bedroom with a dedicated en-suite bathroom, providing privacy and comfort for visitors.

openings.description: Well-designed staircase connecting the ground floor to first floor, ensuring safety and accessibility.
Balconies attached to bedrooms and home office for fresh air and additional privacy.
